name: Udder Chaos: To the Moon
description:
What’s a cow to do when her farmer is taken from her by a group of aliens and their evil, chicken overlord? Meet Ol’Betsy, a dairy cow with Duke Nukem-like inner monologue and a taste for vengeance. Travel through this multi-leveled spaceship with your udder-gun in this classic first-person shooter, blasting aliens, talking trash, and searching for your farmer.

Credits:

Original idea - Matt Perrotti

Story - Chadwick Pearson, Christopher Urban, Ean Stolzer, Madeline Shallop, Mark McLaughlin, Aidan Varkoly

Writing - Madeline Shallop

Audio Editing and Compiling - Madeline Shallop

Voice Editing For Boss - Bill Rouse

Music - Jeffrey Boyer

Various Sound Effects - Epidemic Sound

Weapon Concepts - Mark McLaughlin

Character Concepts and Designs - Mark McLaughlin, Ean Stolzer, Chadwick Pearson

Sprite Creation - Mark McLaughlin

Textures - Ean Stolzer

3d Models - Chadwick Pearson

Cover Art - Ean Stolzer

Visual Effects - Michael V

Level Layout - Christopher Urban

Level Design - Christopher Urban

Room Design - Ean Stolzer

Game Design - Aidan Varkoly

Programing - Aidan Varkoly
